snippet: A state-by-state calculation of the state and federal funds that would be required in the first six years to meet the goals of the Affordable Care Act -- an expansion that some governors have renounced.
abstract: A state-by-state calculation of the state and federal funds that would be required in the first six years to meet the goals of the Affordable Care Act -- an expansion that some governors have renounced.

headline.main: How Much Would the Medicaid Expansion Cost Your State?

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
